ack.p: R. Chipman, M. Mendoza, L. Lecuona, A. Jimenez, R. Medellín, G. McCracken, J. Fisher, K. Nelson, R. Reed, L. Bonewell, A. Yackel-Adams, J. Morisette, and P. Cryan made helpful comments during various stages of this project. Cherokee Nation Technologies and the Invasive Species Science Branch at the U. S. Geological Survey’s Fort Collins Science Center provided administrative support and access to computing resources. We also sincerely thank several anonymous reviewers whose feedback substantially improved the content of this manuscript.
